comment: Dr. Hill was my favorite professor when I graduated with a Psychology degree in 1988. I still remember his enthusiasm for psychology which showed in his dynamic teaching style and his interest in teaching the students. His research classes were the best! Though very challenging, I definitely knew what I was doing by the end! Thanks, Dr. Hill!

I struggled all semester through his class. He used a new teaching method that was of no use to me and confused me more. He never answered a question clearly and his essays were dreadful to write--I love to write but his unclear and unrealistic expectations didn't make me want to write anything in his class! I'm an A-average student and I struggled to maintain a B! So dissapointed!

Amazing professor.  You won't find a more caring human being at KSU.  Want to know how to get an A+? You study, read the book, attend every class, and work really hard.  If you aren't wanting to do that, don't complain if you don't get a great grade.  He is hard, but you learn way more than in an average class.

His class is challenging. You have to do your homework, come to class, read your textbook and be actively learning to do well. It is not an easy class by any means, but if you are interested in psychology you could not have a better teacher for this course. he is passionate about the content, compassionate toward his students and a great lecturer.

Bill Hill is an amazing teacher! He will have fun sometimes, but he's mostly all about getting things done!  I loved his teaching style!  A good grade in this class requires taking notes from the book, going to every class, and studying hard!  I recommend him for anything!

This is by far the BEST professor at KSU. I learned so much from this man. His tests can be a bit tricky because they are more about the application of the material but I had no problems. You have homework assignments for each section, but he puts the assignments on his website. He also emails you a practice test before the test. He is a great teac

An excellent teacher. Lectures depend on class participation. He encourages questions. You have to read the chapters! He gives a lot of extra credit. I think he genuinely wants everyone to excel in his class.

Attendance is a must you get 2 points for every time you show up to class. His tests are insane and much too hard for an easy gen ed course. If you are good at psych take him, if not... good luck. his lectures are boring but sometimes funny. USE YOUR BOOK. his website was really helpful and always hada study guide which was nice!
this proffesor is really boring and makes you want to sleep. his tests are amazingly hard and i never want to go to class but i have to because you are graded on that too!

Bill Hill is a really good teacher!! He is funny and he keeps the class interesting. His tests are a little hard so you have to study. He gives a lot of extra credit points up front and gives a lot of grades.

He is really hot, but his class is boring as hell. All he does is lecture all day every day. Then he gives random quizzes. He is so boring and so is his class. Not recommended unless you just want some eye candy.

He's a good teacher.  He really has a passion for what he does and gladly helps out whenever possible.  His tests are a little on the hard side, but if you study a lot then they're easy.  His class does get a little repetitive and boring, but I think he knows this and tries to help out by using the remotes and stuff.  Overall a good prof.

I absolutely loved him. He made study sessions avalible for all of us in his class. He answered any questions you had. Easy hw and his test are a little tricky. He's big on application of material, examples on tests. He gives a lot of examples when he is teaching so that you are sure to understand. He is a fabulous teacher!

He really tried to work with the students and wanted everyone to do well in his class.  The tests were not bad- all multiple choice.  He used a lot of examples so you could relate to what he was talking about.
great teacher. explains material very well and gives lots of examples. test are a little hard but he give easy homework!
stays in contact constantly with e-mails and reminders...offers study sessions based off of your schedules...very open to helping you if you ask. he's the bomb!
I think his class is incredibley hard and boring.
he's so awesome! I love him as my teacher, I so wouldn't pick ne one else for psych!
GREAT TEACHER!! Loved his class!

He is awesome!! He helps as much as he can.  Explains things thoroughly, and notes are great b/c they are on powerpoint.  He makes the class fun, and doesn't bore you the whole time with just notes.  You do fun games and quizzes.  I recommend him for Psychology
